Articles.Content:
When I try to use the new version of BDA with KSP 1.1.3, I paste the BDA folder into the GameData folder and install the game. The parts appear, but when I launch any craft, the screen is black. When I pause then unpause, the camera starts spiraling and zooming out. Am I doing something wrong, or are the two just incompatible?

 

Thanks!

2 hours ago, HYDRAGENT said:

When I try to use the new version of BDA with KSP 1.1.3, I paste the BDA folder into the GameData folder and install the game. The parts appear, but when I launch any craft, the screen is black. When I pause then unpause, the camera starts spiraling and zooming out. Am I doing something wrong, or are the two just incompatible?

 

Thanks!

Hi!  Welcome to the Forums!

As with all modded install issues, a little (or a lot) information goes a long way.

Please refer to this post:  It will provide you (and us) the information needed to properly troubleshoot your issue... If you read it (completely) and follow the steps, you may even solve your issue yourself!

 

Edited October 14, 2016 by Papa_Joe
